name: Simple Web-Socket Server
short_description:
THE PROJECT DEVELOPMENT IS SUSPENDED FOR NOW AND MAY BE IT WILL BE TERMINATED!!!



SWSS - Simple Web Socket Server. This program is not a professional software and it is just an experimental platform for HTML5 Web-Sockets.
